title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When trying to open the group dialog, an error is displayed instead of the expected behavior. As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
OB: When attempting to open the group dialog without setting the dataset, an error is shown instead of the expected behavior. The error prevents the dialog from being displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not. No error should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Navigate to the group dialog. 
3. Attempt to open the dialog without setting the dataset. 

Expected result: The group dialog should open without any errors, regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
